title: Calories in Crunchwrap Supreme
meta_description: Discover calories in crunchwrap supreme from Taco Bell, including full nutrition breakdown, macros, sodium, and easy tweaks for variations.
assumptions: Standard Taco Bell beef Crunchwrap Supreme with seasoned beef, nacho cheese, lettuce, diced tomatoes, and flour tortilla; no customizations.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by location, preparation, and customizations. Values based on standard recipe; check Taco Bell app or packaging for latest info.

quick_answer.text: One Crunchwrap Supreme packs about 530 calories with 16 g protein and high sodium.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Fresca style (no cheese or sour cream)

faqs.q: How many calories in a Crunchwrap Supreme?
faqs.a: Approximately 530 calories for the standard beef version.

faqs.q: What are the macros in Crunchwrap Supreme?
faqs.a: About 66 g carbs, 24 g fat, 16 g protein, and 7 g fiber.

faqs.q: Is the Crunchwrap Supreme high in sodium?
faqs.a: Yes, around 1300 mg sodium per servingâ€”over half the daily recommended limit.
Similar at about 470-520 kcal, depending on preparation; slightly lower than beef.

faqs.q: How does frying affect calories in Crunchwrap Supreme?
faqs.a: Deep-frying adds oil, increasing calories by 100-200 kcal; stick to grilled for lower fat.
